name: Gigi D'Agostino
description: '''Luigino Celestino di Agostino''' ({{IPA|it|luiˈdʒiːno tʃeleˈstiːno di aɡoˈstiːno}}; born 17 December 1967), known professionally as '''Gigi D'Agostino''' ({{IPA|it|ˈdʒiːdʒi daɡoˈstiːno|pron}}), is an Italian DJ and music producer. In 1986, he started his career as a DJ spinning [[Italo disco]]. His biggest chart successes include "[[Bla Bla Bla (Gigi D'Agostino song)|Bla Bla Bla]]", "[[Another Way (Gigi D'Agostino song)|Another Way]]", a cover of [[Nik Kershaw]]'s "[[The Riddle (Nik Kershaw song)#Gigi D'Agostino version|The Riddle]]", "[[La Passion]]", "[[Super (1, 2, 3)|Super]]" and "[[L'amour toujours|L'Amour Toujours]]", all in the years 1999 and 2000. The hookline of "L'Amour Toujours" was also used for the 2018 hit game remix/mashup "[[In My Mind (Dynoro and Gigi D'Agostino song)|In My Mind]]".
